original: ma h'a s'i ta ba t'i s'a dha nam /
analyzed: ma h'a s'i ta ba t'i s'a dha nam /

original: bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The sādhana of Great Cool Grove

original: bsil ba'i tshal chen mo ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
analyzed: bsil ba'i tshal chen mo ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
translated: Great Cool Grove has one face and four arms.

original: g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis na ni bgrang ba'i phreng ba dang mchog sbyin pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis na ni bgrang ba'i phreng ba dang mchog sbyin pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: In the two right hands she holds a rosary and makes the boon-granting gesture.

original: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis na ni rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang @16a * //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis na ni rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang @16a * //
translated: In the two left hands she holds a vajra and a goad.

original: snying ga na gnas pa'i pu sti dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: snying ga na gnas pa'i pu sti dang ldan pa'o //
translated: She holds a book resting on her heart.

original: sa bon dzam las gyur pa dang / dbu rgyan la snang ba mtha' yas dang skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / nyi ma'i gdan dang / 'od zer dang ldan pa yang yin no bya bas ni 'phags ma bsil ba'i tshal chen po'i sgrub thabs so /
analyzed: sa bon dzam las gyur pa dang / dbu rgyan la snang ba mtha' yas dang skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang / nyi ma'i gdan dang / 'od zer dang ldan pa yang yin no bya bas ni 'phags ma bsil ba'i tshal chen po'i sgrub thabs so /
translated: She arises from the seed syllable jām, has Amitābha as the crown ornament, sits in half-lotus posture, is adorned with various ornaments, has a sun seat, and is radiant. This is the sādhana of the noble Great Cool Grove.

original: // / aa bha ya las tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / aa bha ya las tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
